howToTextInPlayParamSavePage:
Select which playunit is to be played in which hours. The device is in UTC standard time (+0), so select the hours according your timezone. 
 For example if you want to play playunit 1 at ten am local time, and you are in Hungary (CET, which is UTC +2 in summer), use the dropdown to select the playparam next to the 8 am label.
